commit.message: resolve: shorten wording on private constructor error

@@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ error[E0603]: tuple struct constructor `A` is private
   --> $DIR/privacy5.rs:51:16

 LL |     pub struct A(());
-   |                  -- a tuple struct constructor is private if any of its fields is private
+   |                  -- a constructor is private if any of the fields is private
